trans-unit.source: Represents the removal of a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> from a workflow during dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: Representa a remoção de um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> de um fluxo de trabalho durante a atualização dinâmica.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been removed during a dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe pode ser usada por um serviço de controle para determinar qual <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s foram removidos durante a atualização dinâmica.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: An instance of this object is generated for every <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> that is removed (that is, that existed in the workflow prior to this dynamic update, but is gone afterward).
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do objeto é gerada para cada <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>que está sendo removido (ou seja, que existia no fluxo de trabalho antes dessa atualização dinâmica, mas não existe mais posteriormente).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction"></xref> class by using the definition of the removed condition.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RemovedConditionAction"> </xref> classe usando a definição da condição removida.

trans-unit.source: The condition removed from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: A condição é removido do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: addedConditionDefinition is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: addedConditionDefinitioné uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para remover do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para remover do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The ConditionDefinition is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O ConditionDefinition é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para remover do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to remove from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> para remover do fluxo de trabalho.
